mapper.insert: insert into schedule ( task_name, task_description, class_name, param, task_status, second, minute, hour, day, month, weekday, year, cron_expression) values (#{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{second,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update schedule set task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_description = #{taskDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_status = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second = #{second,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, minute = #{minute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hour = #{hour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weekday = #{weekday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cron_expression = #{cronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select UUID, task_name, task_description, class_name, param, task_status, second, minute, hour, day, month, weekday, year, cron_expression from schedule where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select UUID, task_name, task_description, class_name, param, task_status, second, minute, hour, day, month, weekday, year, cron_expression from schedule
